comment: It's gotta feel hella sweet to have an 'I got vaccinated' sticker to go with your Douglas Adams t-shirt!
amr:
# ::snt It's gotta feel hella sweet to have an 'I got vaccinated' sticker to go with your Douglas Adams t-shirt!
(o / obligate-01
      :ARG2 (f / feel-01
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (s / sweet-03

                              :mod (v / vaccinate-01

                        :ARG1-of (g / go-22

                                          :name (n / name

                                                :op2 "Adams")))))
                  :degree (h2 / hell))))
